title: KMSAuto v1.00.XP Portable EN RU
description:
KMSAutoXP Portable v1.00.XP by Ratiborus.

			  For Windows XP 
		
			Description:
KMSAutoXP - automatic KMS-activator for VL versions of
  Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Windows Vista, 7, & 8
  Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Server 2008, 2008 R2, &2012
  Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Office 2010 & 2013.
It works without installation and performs activation without leaving 
any traces in the system. It also removes a folder with its settings from profile
and easily lets you change PID. Based on modified KMS Server Service by 
CODYQX4 (MDL). PID can be edited inside .ini files located in config folder.
It is also possible to install KMS-activator for automatic reactivation by Software 
Protection Platforms (once in week).

			Using the Program:
Run KMSAutoXP.exe.

 S) Set KMS-Server address        	- Selection submenu of KMS Server address
 A) Windows & Office activation submenu - Go to activation submenu
 L) Show license status                 - Shows Windows & Office license information 
					  in console
 G) Copy license status into file 	- Copies license information into ActStatus.log
					  file
 P) Task Scheduler Settings		- Create a Task in Task Scheduler
 D) Clear KMS-Host address		- Set KMS-host address to default
 R) Help file         			- Show this file in console
 Q) Exit				- Shutdown KMSAutoXP

			Activation submenu commands:

W,WA) Activate Windows		        - Activates Windows
O,OA) Activate Office		        - Activates Office 2010-2013
 K) Set Windows GVLK                    - Set Windows GVLK (for KMS activation)
 P) Set custom Office installation path - Enter your own path for Office
                                          installation
 L) Show license status                 - Shows Windows & Office license information
					  in console
 E) Return to Main Menu WITHOUT shutdown KMS-Server
     (Turn on permanent reactivation)
 Q) Return to Main Menu and shutdown KMS-Server
     (One-time activation)
			***********************
